title: [TOIL] Manual security scan review
body:
### Your name

Test User Alpha

### What's the toil?

Manually reviewing security scan results across 20 repos every morning.

### How often does it happen?

🔴 Multiple times per day

### How long does it take each time?

> 1 hour

### Who is affected?

4–6 people

### Bonus factors (optional)

- [x] ❌ Error-prone — this toil frequently causes mistakes or data errors
- [x] 😤 Morale killer — this toil is particularly frustrating or demoralizing
- [ ] 🔗 Blocking — this toil blocks other people or downstream processes

### Automation idea (if any)

_No response_

title: [TOIL] Update changelog
body:
### Your name

Test User Beta

### What's the toil?

Updating changelog after each release.

### How often does it happen?

🔵 Weekly

### How long does it take each time?

5–15 minutes

### Who is affected?

Just me

### Bonus factors (optional)

- [ ] ❌ Error-prone
- [ ] 😤 Morale killer
- [ ] 🔗 Blocking

### Automation idea (if any)

Already automated with a GitHub Action.
